title: A Short History of Scotland
creator: Andrew Lang
description: LibriVox recording of A Short History of Scotland by Andrew Lang, read by Sibella Denton. A Short History of Scotland is a concise introduction to the history of Scotland from Roman times to the last Jacobite rebellion, written by the author of a much longer Scottish history. (Summary by Sibella Denton.) For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org M4B audiobook of Complete Book
subject: LibriVox;audio books;history;Scotland
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text

reviews.reviewbody: Well read, but not quite well enough written to get more stars.  Good, but not particularly good compared to other histories.
reviews.reviewtitle: An average history, although well read
